name: mini_chart
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool chart_img.
Tool description: CHART-IMG.COM API designed to take screenshots of the most popular crypto charts and tools.
API description: Generates a TradingView mini chart image based on the specified parameters and returns the image data or error message.

width.description:
`The field must be within the valid range.`

Minimum: `320`

| Plan  | Max width |
| ----- | --------- |
| BASIC | 800 |

format.description: Format of the chart image. Supported formats are 'png' and 'jpeg'. Default is 'png'.

symbol.description: TradingView symbol for the chart. Examples include 'BINANCE:BTCUSDT' and 'BINANCE:BTCUSDTPERP'. Default is 'BINANCE:BTCUSDT'.

interval.description: Time interval for the chart. Supported intervals are '1d', '1M', '3M', '1Y', '5Y', and 'all'. Default is '1M'.

theme.description: Color theme of the chart. Supported themes are 'light' and 'dark'. Default is 'dark'.

height.description:
`The field must be within the valid range.`

Minimum: `220`

| Plan  | Max height |
| ----- | --------- |
| BASIC | 600 |
